multiple_choice.question: What does the infinity-shaped logo on the Octopus card symbolize?

options.B: Unending usability and freedom of movement

multiple_choice.question: Why would the Octopus card's plastic body be preferable to paper or metal?

options.B: It is waterproof, flexible, and durable

multiple_choice.question: How does the presence of both English and Chinese text benefit users?

options.C: It serves local and tourist populations in Hong Kong

multiple_choice.question: Which design element helps visually reinforce the idea of motion and connectivity?
Why is the Octopus card a better choice than coins for public transport?

options.C: It eliminates physical currency handling and is faster

multiple_choice.question: What does the presence of a unique printed number on the card indicate?

options.A: It links to the user's biometric data
options.C: It identifies each card for transaction tracking

multiple_choice.question: What role does color play in the Octopus card's branding?

options.D: Enhances brand recognition and visual identity

multiple_choice.question: Why is an NFC card like Octopus preferred over magnetic stripe cards?

options.C: It is more secure and less prone to wear
options.D: It has a smaller memory size

multiple_choice.question: Why might scratches on the Octopus card still not affect its function?

options.B: The important chip and antenna are embedded inside

multiple_choice.question: What does the rectangular and slim shape of the card enable?

options.B: Easy stacking in wallets and card readers

multiple_choice.question: How can the Octopus card support both human and machine usage?

options.C: It can be tapped at automated gates or handed to staff

multiple_choice.question: Why might black be chosen as the background color of the card?

options.B: To contrast and highlight the colorful logo

multiple_choice.question: What feature allows the Octopus card to be recharged multiple times?
Why is the Octopus card not printed with personal user info?

options.C: To maintain user privacy and ease anonymous use

multiple_choice.question: Why does the Octopus logo appear prominently in the center?

options.C: To emphasize brand identity at a glance

multiple_choice.question: What makes the card ideal for elderly users or children?

options.B: Simple tap function with no buttons

multiple_choice.question: How does the Octopus card reduce queue time in metro stations?

options.C: Its NFC and centralized backend system

multiple_choice.question: If someone lost their card, what can be inferred about data loss?

options.C: Funds may be recoverable if the card is registered
